author: larryi
msg: Minimize vulnerability from SimpleDateFormat's non-thread safety.

author: hgomez
msg: You could use now +ForwardUnparsedUri to send URI as unparsed
to follow spec or -ForwardUnparsedUri to send URI normaly
New options also, +ForwardKeySize to send via ajp13 the
SSL KEY SIZE which is required by Servlet 2.3 spec but
Just need some code in jk_ajp13_worker.c

author: hgomez
msg: Solid reworks to better handle comm part.
We don't try to handle partial packet, use
of readN to ensure having all data in packets
(even in header which is 4 bytes long)

author: hgomez
msg: Pass debug flag from data set in server.xml to
Ajp13/Ajp13Request. Very usefull in debug stage

author: hgomez
msg: When a non ajp13 packet header is sent on an ajp13
connection, we don't try to dump it (it's just only 4 bytes !=)
